description: utility2.js - standalone, browser test and code coverage framework for nodejs
name: utility2

scripts.test: ./utility2.js --load-module utility2.js --mode-npm-test-utility2 && ./utility2.js --load-module utility2.js --mode-extra --mode-npm-test-utility2 && if [ $TRAVIS ]; then cat tmp/lcov.info | node_modules/.bin/coveralls; fi
